name: John doe
review: Never lose your remote behind sofa cushions again. With the Finder function, you simply need to say ''OK Google, find my remote'' or press the button on the side of your TV to activate your missing remote. so its very helpful i think

review: These device designed with a flush surface featuring lower buttons and a special polyurethane coating, our remote is easy to wipe27 and keep clean. so build in method are very powerful but overall not ok

review: All my connected devices can be controlled with my smart remote. One button access to video on demand services brings shows  so these part is very helpful for me cause i am very lazy and i think its very useful for lazy persons and sony is best

name: Black Devil
review: A versatile adjustable stand allows you to place this compact OLED TV on a shelf or desktop and use it as a television or as the ideal gaming display.Actual look may differ depending on TV size.

name: Andre Rassel
review: A versatile 2-way stand with a standard setting that focuses you on the picture or soundbar setting for ideal positioning of your sound system. Thanks to the adjustable stand, you can also use the TV as a gaming display on a desktop.30

review: Discover new movies and shows from across your subscriptions and content available to you. There's even a special Kids Profile that helps you guide children to age-appropriate content.

name: Ainstain De
review: It's have completely redesigned our remote for effortless control of your TV, day or night. Our new premium remote is easy to use, with simplified buttons and a backlight.
